qas.question: According to early texts, when was Siddhārtha Gautama born?
According to early texts, where was Siddhārtha Gautama born?

answers.text: in a community that was on the periphery, both geographically and culturally, of the northeastern Indian subcontinent

qas.question: What type of community was Siddhārtha Gautama raised in?

answers.text: It was either a small republic, in which case his father was an elected chieftain, or an oligarchy, in which case his father was an oligarch.

qas.question: What size was Siddhārtha Gautama's birthplace?
Where did we find proof of his existence?
What was most likely Siddhārtha Gautama's father?
Who was born in a northeastern part of India/
If Siddhartha lived in a small republic, his father would have been a what?

context: The evidence of the <a6_0>early texts<a6_0/> suggests that <a8_0>Siddhārtha Gautama<a8_0/> was born <a1_0>in a community that was on the periphery, both geographically and culturally, of <a3_0>the northeastern Indian subcontinent<a3_0/><a1_0/> in the <a0_0><a4_0>fifth century BCE<a4_0/><a0_0/>. <a2_0>It was either <a5_0>a small republic<a5_0/>, in which case his father was an <a9_0>elected chieftain<a9_0/>, or <a7_0>an oligarchy<a7_0/>, in which case his father was an oligarch.
